about_the_game:
About this game

Many kanji can be made by combining other kanji.
Watch the kanji assembly factory work automatically!

Game flow

The game progresses in stages.
Stages are automatically generated when you start the game from the beginning. You can play again and again!
If you clear the stage, you can choose and get your favorite machine from among the three. Predict what machines you'll need in the next stage and collect them strategically!

How to

1. Place the generator. This machine generates the specified kanji at regular intervals.


2. Place the assembler. This machine takes two kanji next to each other and assembles them into one kanji.


3. Place the deliverer. You can clear the stage by delivering the kanji specified for each stage with this machine.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7 or later
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or above
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Kanji Industry is an roguelike automatic kanji production game. Players build a production line by arranging machines. The entire game progresses in a deck-building roguelike format. You can get the machine by clearing the stage. Let's enjoy high strategy!
